t=int(raw_input())
for i in range(t):
    dic={}
    dic2={}
    a,b=map(str,raw_input().split())
    for j in range(len(a)):
        if a[j] in dic:
            dic[a[j]]+=1
        else:
            dic[a[j]]=1
    for j in range(len(b)):
        if b[j] in dic2:
            dic2[b[j]]+=1
        else:
            dic2[b[j]]=1
    flag=1
    if len(dic)==len(dic2):
        for j in dic:
            if j in dic2:
                if dic[j]!=dic2[j]:
                    flag=0
                    break
            else:
                flag=0
                break
        if flag==1:
            print "YES"
        else:
            print "NO"
    else:
        print "NO"
